about_the_game:
Explore forgotten temples in the desert with the 2nd track pack for Moto Racer 4: Antique Antics

Demonstrate your skill as you hurtle through impressive ancient ruins half-buried in the desert sands, on the two new circuits included in this pack:

Asphalt – Trident Temple: Challenge your opponents on this track with tight and fast bends, and choose the line you'll take through this sacred site.

Dirt – Bumpy Ride : Ride the crest of the dunes on this new track through the vast expanse of the desert. Will you be able to stay in the saddle?
detailed_description:
Explore forgotten temples in the desert with the 2nd track pack for Moto Racer 4: Antique Antics

Demonstrate your skill as you hurtle through impressive ancient ruins half-buried in the desert sands, on the two new circuits included in this pack:

Asphalt – Trident Temple: Challenge your opponents on this track with tight and fast bends, and choose the line you'll take through this sacred site.

Dirt – Bumpy Ride : Ride the crest of the dunes on this new track through the vast expanse of the desert. Will you be able to stay in the saddle?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11 - compatible
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

name: Moto Racer 4 - Antique Antics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo CPU E6550 at 2.33GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 1 GB or more and should be a DirectX 11 - compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Explore forgotten temples in the desert with the 2nd track pack for Moto Racer 4: Antique Antics
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish
